column4: can anyone tell me how to tell apt-get to automatically get any dependencies?
can anyone tell me how to tell apt-get to automatically get any dependencies?
just grab whatever it needs too
ok its still not downloading them
just says the foloowing packages have unmet dependencies
that's not a a problem with apt
it's a problem with how you configured it
paste the full error and the contents of /etc/apt/sources.list to #flood
if you have to ask, you should not be installing packages from Debian on ubuntu
what are you trying to do?
there isn't a firewall at all by default
if you're behind a dsl or cable modem, tho, you probably have been nat'd
it's fine, don't add other repositories unless you know what they contain and are for
